trans-unit.source: Starting the 32-Bit Version of Windows PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Starting the 32-Bit Version of Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Starting the 32-Bit Version of Windows PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Starting the 32-Bit Version of Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: When you install [!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)] on a 64\-bit computer, **Windows PowerShell (x86)**, a 32\-bit version of [!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)] is installed in addition to the 64\-bit version.
trans-unit.target: When you install [!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)] on a 64\-bit computer, **Windows PowerShell (x86)**, a 32\-bit version of [!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)] is installed in addition to the 64\-bit version.

trans-unit.source: When you run [!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)], the 64\-bit version runs by default.
trans-unit.target: When you run [!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)], the 64\-bit version runs by default.

trans-unit.source: However, you might occasionally need to run **Windows PowerShell (x86)**, such as when you are using a module that requires the 32\-bit version or when you are connecting remotely to a 32\-bit computer.
trans-unit.target: However, you might occasionally need to run **Windows PowerShell (x86)**, such as when you are using a module that requires the 32\-bit version or when you are connecting remotely to a 32\-bit computer.

trans-unit.source: To start a 32\-bit version of [!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)], use any of the following procedures.
trans-unit.target: To start a 32\-bit version of [!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)], use any of the following procedures.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_1](../Token/winblue_server_1_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: In [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_1](../Token/winblue_server_1_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: On the **Start** screen, type **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Start** screen, type **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Windows PowerShell x86** tile.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Windows PowerShell x86** tile.

trans-unit.source: In **Server Manager**, from the **Tools** menu, select **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.
trans-unit.target: In **Server Manager**, from the **Tools** menu, select **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.

trans-unit.source: On the desktop, move the cursor to the upper right corner, click **Search**, type **PowerShell x86** and then click **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.
trans-unit.target: On the desktop, move the cursor to the upper right corner, click **Search**, type **PowerShell x86** and then click **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: In [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: On the **Start** screen, type **PowerShell** and then click **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Start** screen, type **PowerShell** and then click **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.

trans-unit.source: In **Server Manager**, from the **Tools** menu, select **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.
trans-unit.target: In **Server Manager**, from the **Tools** menu, select **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.

trans-unit.source: On the desktop, move the cursor to the upper right corner, click **Search**, type **PowerShell** and then click **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.
trans-unit.target: On the desktop, move the cursor to the upper right corner, click **Search**, type **PowerShell** and then click **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: In [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: On the **Start** screen, type **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Start** screen, type **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Windows PowerShell x86** tile.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Windows PowerShell x86** tile.

trans-unit.source: If you are running [Remote Server Administration Tools](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=304145) for [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], you can also open [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] x86 from the **Server ManagerTools** menu.
trans-unit.target: If you are running [Remote Server Administration Tools](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=304145) for [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], you can also open [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] x86 from the **Server ManagerTools** menu.

trans-unit.source: Select **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.
trans-unit.target: Select **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.

trans-unit.source: On the desktop, move the cursor to the upper right corner, click **Search**, type **PowerShell x86** and then click **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.
trans-unit.target: On the desktop, move the cursor to the upper right corner, click **Search**, type **PowerShell x86** and then click **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: In [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: On the **Start** screen, move the cursor to the upper right corner, click **Settings**, click **Tiles**, and then move the **Show Administrative Tools** slider to Yes.
trans-unit.target: On the **Start** screen, move the cursor to the upper right corner, click **Settings**, click **Tiles**, and then move the **Show Administrative Tools** slider to Yes.

trans-unit.source: Then, type **PowerShell** and click **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.
trans-unit.target: Then, type **PowerShell** and click **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.

trans-unit.source: If you are running [Remote Server Administration Tools](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=28972) for [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], you can also open [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] x86 from the **Server ManagerTools** menu.
trans-unit.target: If you are running [Remote Server Administration Tools](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=28972) for [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], you can also open [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] x86 from the **Server ManagerTools** menu.

trans-unit.source: Select **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.
trans-unit.target: Select **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Start** screen or the desktop, type **PowerShell (x86)** and then click **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Start** screen or the desktop, type **PowerShell (x86)** and then click **Windows PowerShell (x86)**.
